sqlMap.select: SELECT issue_id, supply_id, issue_date, requestor, quantity, dept_id, last_user, last_update FROM issued_supplies_blprr isb WHERE ( EXISTS( SELECT supply_id FROM supplies_blprr WHERE supply_id = isb.supply_id AND LOWER(item_name) like '%$param$%' ) OR issue_id like '%$param$%') AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT supply_id FROM supplies_blprr WHERE supply_id = isb.supply_id AND NVL(obsolete_tag, 'N') = 'Y' ) ORDER BY issue_id
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO issued_supplies_blprr(supply_id, issue_date, requestor, quantity, dept_id, last_user, last_update) VALUES(#supplyId#, #issueDate#, #requestor#, #quantity#, #deptId#, #lastUser#, #lastUpdate#)

UPDATE issued_supplies_blprr SET supply_id = #supplyId# , issue_date = #issueDate# , requestor = #requestor# , quantity = #quantity# , dept_id = #deptId# , last_user = #lastUser# , last_update = #lastUpdate# WHERE issue_id = #issueId#
